definition: cuts and bruises like fish scales/terribly cut up
covered all over with cuts and bruises/beaten black and blue/be a mass of bruises

sentences.english: They Covered Their Bodies With Bruises And Wounds, And Denied Them Food And Shelter.
sentences.chinese: 他們都被弄得遍體鱗傷，也得不到食物和住處。

sentences.english: The hull was pocked with dents.
But after were beatenblack and blue, thats when we know were just thegrass.
sentences.chinese: 可是最後遍體鱗傷，我才知道我們原來都只是草。

sentences.english: Other gamblers beat him black and blue since he lost but couldn't pay.
sentences.chinese: 他賭輸了，又付不出錢，其它賭徒把他揍得遍體鱗傷。

sentences.english: Why to don't want the whole body covered with wounds that ego move.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼非要把自己動的遍體鱗傷。

sentences.english: Self-deception is likely to get the better of you this week.
sentences.chinese: 自欺欺人只會弄得自己遍體鱗傷。

sentences.english: The man threatened to beat the boy black and blue for stealing.
sentences.chinese: 那人威嚇要把偷東西得孩子打得遍體鱗傷。

sentences.english: Do not play too true acting, otherwise it will bear the scars.
sentences.chinese: 演戲別演太真，不然會遍體鱗傷。

sentences.english: His body was bruised, his hands were bleeding, and his rags were all besmirched with mud .
sentences.chinese: 他已遍體鱗傷，手上在流血，一身破衣服沾滿了污泥。

sentences.english: It was my bloody thorn cusp , black and blue.
sentences.chinese: 它的尖角刺得我鮮血淋漓，遍體鱗傷。
